text:
Bhai kele, bhale hi me dusre wing ka tha lekin tumhare room me hi pura maze karne aata tha pure first year me. bhai jo call aata tha tera MM ke liye aaja sherkhan phir pure 10-12 log tere room me ho jate the aur sabse jada tu hi chillata tha especially mujh par. apni ladai bhi kafi hue hai choti choti baat pe lekin maza bhi bahut aaya hai tere sath. bhai woh mukhteshwar wala trip hamesha yaad rahega jo zostel me maze kare the tum logo ke sath.
Ese hi muskurate rehna aur chaapte rehna, aur jaldi se UPSC bhi crack kar lena and congrats for cracking IIMA, IIMB and all the best for your future,
author: Suhail  Khan

text: Bhai sachin tumhare pass hi aata tha me har baar assignment ke liye, bahut help kare ho be. acha hua tum branch change kar liye. tumhare bharose hi chod deta tha har cheez. Mujhe to tum loner nahi lagte, itna to mil jul ke rehte the sab ke sath. roote roote intern lagwa liye pata bhi nahi chala aur phir PPO. chalo intern ka party to de diya tha tune. pagalo ki tarah nachte ho bhai pura video rakha hai tumhara. hopefully phir milna hoga kabhi aur ese hi tarakki karte rehna. All the best.
author: Suhail  Khan

text: Bhai shashi bahut maze kare hai bhai sath me. Woh roz raat ko badminton khelna, Ipl ke time team banana, players ko galiyana aur tumhari hawabaji sunnaðŸ˜‚, weekend me Z square aur movie to fix hi tha. Raat ko ese hi campus ke bahar raj aur bihari ke sath cycling pe jana aur woh amritsar ka tour. Manali wale me kaat ke ghar chale gaye the, woh yaad rahega mujheðŸ˜›, hopefully aur achi jagah chalege. Bhai tumne pura balance banake rakha, enjoy bhi bahut kara ham logo ke sath aur academics me bhi chaapa. bas final year ka enjoyment reh gaya apna. Hopefully phirse milna hoga kabhiðŸ™‚ and All the best for your future.
author: Suhail  Khan
